title: Fragment, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: compound weave with supplementary weft
description: Fragment of horizontally ribbed, self-patterned with curving checkered leaves and brocaded with typical Louis XV trimming sprays of flowers in greens, blues, mauves, pinks, white and yellow.

Fragment, 18th century.Medium: silk
Technique: compound weave with supplementary weft. 1949-114-18-c.
